name: FPS Grey Armor Tactic
description:
"FPS Grey Armor Tactic" develop on Coppercube 6.4 Game Engine.

Two Levels - Kill the enemies and defeat the Big Boss Player to succeed to next level. Pick up Health pack on the floor to gain your health so you won't die.

5 LEVELS TO COMPLETE

WASD - Walk Direction

Arrow Keys - Run Direction

Left Mouse - Shoot 

Right Mouse - Scope Shoot

R Button - Reload

Space Bar - Jump

Join the Community - https://www.facebook.com/groups/539282439924619
